text: Martina Hingis was the defending champion and successfully defended her title, by defeating Meghann Shaughnessy 6–2, 6–3 in the final. It was the 1st title for Hingis in the season and the 39th in her career. ==Seeds== The first four seeds received a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main and Qualifying Rounds Women's Singles Singles
title: 2002 Adidas International – Women's Singles
